data.question: What is the chemical formula of the doped framework material studied?
What phenomenon induces the extreme change in the crystal lattice conformation?
True or False: The study demonstrates electronic control over mechanical motion.
What is the effect of diluting the framework with Ni(II) sites?
data.answer: It produces a more gradual transition and continuous lattice movement.

data.question: What is the magnitude of the coefficients of thermal expansion observed?
data.answer: An order of magnitude greater than previously reported

data.question: True or False: The spin crossover phenomenon can only be induced by temperature changes.
What is the role of the bpac ligand in the framework?
data.answer: It acts as a pillar, forming a three-dimensional net.

data.question: True or False: The spin crossover behavior of [Fe] is non-cooperative.
What is the effect of temperature on the spin crossover transition in [Fe]?
data.answer: It induces an abrupt HS to LS transition.

data.question: True or False: The lattice flexing behavior observed is common in spin crossover materials.
What is the significance of the Fe(II) coordination geometry change?
data.answer: It drives the scissor-like lattice flexing behavior.

data.question: True or False: The spin crossover transition in [Fe] is reversible.
What is the role of Ni(II) dilution in the framework?
data.answer: It disrupts the lattice cooperativity, resulting in more gradual spin transition behavior.

data.question: True or False: The spin crossover transition in [Fe] is accompanied by a large enthalpic change.
What is the effect of the spin crossover transition on the lattice parameters?
data.answer: It results in significant changes in the a, b, and c parameters.

data.question: True or False: The spin crossover transition temperature is the same for all [FexNi1-x] materials.
What is the impact of the spin crossover transition on the framework's mechanical properties?
data.answer: It generates extreme positive and negative linear thermal expansion.

data.question: True or False: The spin crossover transition in [Fe] does not involve a change in the Fe–N bond length.
What is the significance of the Au···Au distance in the framework?
data.answer: It is indicative of strong aurophilic interactions.

data.question: True or False: The spin crossover-induced lattice flexing behavior is driven solely by temperature changes.
